media.headline: Simmons' RBI double
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Simmons' double plates first run of the game
media.bigblurb: Andrelton Simmons places a double down the first-base line that plates C.J. Cron for the first run of the game in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Espinosa's two-RBI single
media.bigblurb: Danny Espinosa rips a single to left that scores two, giving the Angels a 3-0 lead in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Trout's RBI single
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Trout's single extends the lead in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Mike Trout rips an RBI single up the middle that extends the Angels' lead to 4-0 in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Alonso's spectacular catch
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Alonso makes an over the shoulder grab
media.bigblurb: Yonder Alonso makes a spectacular over the shoulder catch in foul territory to end the the top of the 4th

media.headline: Pujols' RBI single
media.bigblurb: Albert Pujols singles to right, scoring Kole Calhoun to extend the Angels' lead to 5-0 in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Coulombe's quick grab
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Coulombe robs Simmons of a base hit
media.bigblurb: Daniel Coulombe makes a quick catch on a line drive hit back at him off the bat of Andrelton Simmons in the 8th inning

media.headline: Cotton K's Trout
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Cotton strikes out Trout swinging
media.bigblurb: Jharel Cotton strikes out Mike Trout swinging in the top of the 1st inning for his first K of the 2017 season

media.headline: Alvarez gets out of a jam
media.blurb: TOR@BAL: Alvarez gets Canha to pop out, stranding two
media.bigblurb: Jose Alvarez comes into the game after Garrett Richards' injury and gets Mark Canha to pop out, stranding two runners in the 5th

media.headline: Richards K's Healy
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Richards strikes out Healy swinging
media.bigblurb: Garrett Richards strikes out Ryon Healy swinging in the bottom of the 1st inning for his first K of the 2017 season

media.headline: Simmons' sliding stop
media.bigblurb: Andrelton Simmons makes a sliding play up the middle to deny Matt Joyce a base-hit in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Richards leaves with an injury
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Richards pulled from game in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Angels pitcher Garrett Richards is pulled from the game in the 5th inning with an apparent injury

media.headline: Scioscia on Richards' injury
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Scioscia gives update on Richards' injury
media.bigblurb: Manager Mike Scioscia discusses the bicep injury suffered by pitcher Garrett Richards in the Angels win over the Athletics

media.headline: Melvin talks A's loss to Angels
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Melvin discusses Cotton's outing in loss
media.bigblurb: A's manager Bob Melvin discusses Jharel Cotton's struggles against the Angels and Mike Trout

media.headline: Recap: LAA 5, OAK 0
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Trout, Richards power Angels to 5-0 win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Mike Trout and Albert Pujols each drove in runs and Garrett Richards went 4 2/3 scoreless innings to earn the win
